sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均可表示"地球"之意。
means: earth ： 指表面有陆地和水，人类所居住行星的名字。有时与"天"相对，泛指"地"。
world ： 通常相当于earth与globe，现多用指地球，地球上的世界，社会和人。
globe ： 指我们生活的地球，但强调其实体和圆形。

sentence.Network_en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
sentence.Network_cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

sentence.Network_en: A changing world has put pressures on the company.
sentence.Network_cn: 日新月异的世界使这家公司感到了压力。

sentence.Network_en: "Take That" are the best group in the whole world. So there.
sentence.Network_cn: “接招”乐队是世界上最好的组合，就是这样的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 世界贸易组织采取““。在WTO事务中，“多边“是相对于区域或其他数量较少的国家集团所进行的活动而言的。大多数国家，包括世界上几乎所有主要贸易国，都是该体制的成员，但仍有一些国家不是，因此使用“多边（multilateral）“一词，而不用“全球(global)“或“世界(world)“等词。的最大目的是使贸易尽可能自由流动。
《Friends》词汇表A ... hello int. 喂, 哈罗 world n. 世界, ...界, 世事, 世故, 社会 whipped whipped 受到鞭打的.
音乐排行榜 ... 流派: 摇滚 Rock 流派: 世界音乐 World 流派: 流行 Pop.
世界一周旅行者 circumnavigator世界上 world世界中小企业协会 Wasme

衬衫 【行情价格评价正品行货】 ... polomeisdo 英国保罗 World Man 宇宙人 VONSURKI 万寻.
所谓“世界图像”(world picture)，并不是关于世界的图像，而是世界以图像的方式被感知接受，这是现代所特有的现象，也是现代不同 …

phrase.cizu_name: be not long for this world

jx.jx_en_mean: have only a short time to live

phrase.cizu_name: the best of both (或 all possible) worlds

jx.jx_en_mean: the benefits of widely differing situations, enjoyed at the same time
give birth to or assist at the birth of someone

phrase.cizu_name: come up (或 go down) in the world

jx.jx_en_mean: rise (or drop) in status, especially by becoming richer (or poorer)

phrase.cizu_name: look for all the world like

jx.jx_cn_mean: ［用作强调］看起来简直一模一样

lj.lj_ly: fossil imprints that look for all the world like motorcycle tracks.
lj.lj_ls: 化石印痕看起来与汽车的车辙简直一模一样。

jx.jx_en_mean: a person who is experienced in the ways of sophisticated society

phrase.cizu_name: not do something for the world

jx.jx_en_mean: not do something whatever the inducement

lj.lj_ly: I wouldn't miss it for the world.
lj.lj_ls: 无论如何我也决不错过。

jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)十全十美的，好得不可思议的

lj.lj_ly: a herb and lemon dressing that's out of this world.
lj.lj_ls: 芳草和柠檬简直是再好没有的调料。

jx.jx_en_mean: travel widely and gain wide experience
have a very high regard for (someone)
jx.jx_cn_mean: 非常看重，十分钦佩（某人）

lj.lj_ly: I thought the world of my father.

jx.jx_cn_mean: (英)许多人；各色人等；所有的人

lj.lj_ly: now all the world and his wife seems to have heard of them.
lj.lj_ls: 现在所有的人似乎都已听说那些事。

phrase.cizu_name: the world, the flesh, and the devil

jx.jx_en_mean: all forms of temptation to sin
jx.jx_cn_mean: 物质享受、肉欲与魔鬼（指造成人类罪孽的各种诱惑）

lj.lj_ly: there's a world of difference between being alone and being lonely.
lj.lj_ls: 独自一人和孤独之间有很大的差别。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English w(e)oruld, from a Germanic compound meaning 'age of man'; related to Dutch wereld and German Welt

entry.def: The world is the planet that we live on.

example.ex: It's a beautiful part of the world...
example.tran: 这是世界上很美的一个地区。

example.ex: More than anything, I'd like to drive around the world...
example.tran: 我最想做的事是开车周游世界。

entry.def: The world refers to all the people who live on this planet, and our societies, institutions, and ways of life.

example.ex: The world was, and remains, shocked...
example.tran: 世人当时感到震惊，现在仍然如此。

example.ex: He wants to show the world that anyone can learn to be an ambassador.
example.tran: 他想向世人表明任何人都能通过学习而成为一名大使。

entry.tran: 世界上最重要的;举世瞩目的
entry.def: You can use world to describe someone or something that is one of the most important or significant of its kind on earth.

example.ex: Abroad, Mr Bush was seen as a world statesman...
example.tran: 在国外，布什先生被看作一位国际上举足轻重的政治家。

example.ex: China has once again emerged as a world power...
example.tran: 中国又一次以世界强国的姿态崛起。

entry.tran: (指某一群国家或历史时期)世界，国家，时代
entry.def: You can use world in expressions such as the Arab world ,the western world, and the ancient world to refer to a particular group of countries or a particular period in history.

example.ex: Athens had strong ties to the Arab world.
example.tran: 雅典与阿拉伯世界关系密切。

example.ex: ...the developing world...
example.tran: 发展中国家

entry.def: Someone's world is the life they lead, the people they have contact with, and the things they experience.

example.ex: His world seemed so different from mine...
example.tran: 他的生活圈子和我的似乎有天壤之别。

example.ex: I lost my job and it was like my world collapsed...
example.tran: 我丢了工作，我的世界好像都垮掉了。

entry.def: You can use world to refer to a particular field of activity, and the people involved in it.

example.ex: The publishing world had certainly never seen an event quite like this.
example.tran: 出版界以前确实没有遇见过类似这样的事。

example.ex: ...the latest news from the world of finance.
example.tran: 来自金融界的最新消息

entry.tran: （有某种特色的）地方，环境；（某种生活的）世界，境况
entry.def: You can use world to refer to a place or way of life by describing its strongest features.

example.ex: ...a golf course set in a hidden world of parkland, forest and lakes...
example.tran: 位于一处有公共绿地、森林和湖泊的隐秘之地的高尔夫球场

example.ex: The patient must re-enter a world full of problems and stresses.
example.tran: 患者必须再次进入充满问题和压力的世界。

entry.def: You can use world in expressions such as this world ,the next world, and the world to come to refer to the state of being alive or a state of existence after death.

example.ex: Good fortune will follow you, both in this world and the next.
example.tran: 无论今世还是来生，好运都会伴随你。

entry.def: You can use world to refer to a particular group of living things, for example the animal world ,the plant world, and the insect world.
A world is a planet.

example.ex: He looked like something from another world...
example.tran: 他看上去像是从另一个星球来的。

example.ex: Man was drawing closer to the stars, opening new worlds.
example.tran: 人类在接近各个星球，探索新的天体。

entry.def: If you say that two people or things are worlds apart, you are emphasizing that they are very different from each other.

example.ex: Intellectually, this man and I are worlds apart...
example.tran: 在智力上，我和这个男子有天壤之别。

example.ex: The novel is worlds apart from his academic writings.
example.tran: 这本小说和他的学术著作截然不同。

entry.def: If you say that someone has the best of both worlds, you mean that they have only the benefits of two things and none of the disadvantages.

example.ex: Her living room provides the best of both worlds, with an office at one end and comfortable sofas at the other.
example.tran: 她家客厅一头是办公处，一头是舒适的沙发，真是两全其美。

entry.def: If a woman brings a child into the world, she gives birth to it.

example.ex: I never felt I achieved a great deal in my life, apart from bringing my children into the world.
example.tran: 除了生了几个孩子，我从未觉得自己这辈子取得了很大成就。

entry.def: If you say that there is a world of difference between one thing and another, you are emphasizing that they are very different from each other.

example.ex: There's a world of difference between an amateur video and a slick Hollywood production.
example.tran: 业余制作的录像短片与好莱坞制作精湛的电影作品有天壤之别。

entry.def: If you say that you would not do something for the world, you are emphasizing that you definitely would not do it.

example.ex: I wouldn't have missed this for the world.
example.tran: 我决不会错过这个。

entry.tran: 让…感觉好很多；对…大有好处
entry.def: If you say that something has done someone the world of good or a world of good, you mean that it has made them feel better or improved their life.

example.ex: A sleep will do you the world of good.
example.tran: 睡一觉你就会感觉舒服多了。

example.ex: ...a mature performance which must have done his career prospects a world of good.
example.tran: 肯定为他的事业打开了一片坦途的成熟表演

entry.def: You use in the world to emphasize a statement that you are making.

example.ex: The saddest thing in the world is a little baby nobody wants...
example.tran: 世上最让人难受的莫过于小婴儿遭到遗弃。

example.ex: He had no one in the world but her.
example.tran: 除了她，他再也没有任何亲人。

entry.tran: (尤用于强调惊讶或愤怒)究竟，到底
entry.def: You can use in the world in expressions such as what in the world and who in the world to emphasize a question, especially when expressing surprise or anger.

example.ex: What in the world is he doing?...
example.tran: 他究竟在干什么？

example.ex: Where in the world were you when I was struggling for my life?
example.tran: 我挣扎求生的时候，你究竟在哪儿？

entry.tran: 在理想（或完美）的世界中；在理想状况下
entry.def: You can use in an ideal world or in a perfect world when you are talking about things that you would like to happen, although you realize that they are not likely to happen.

example.ex: In an ideal world Karen Stevens says she would love to stay at home with her two-and-half-year old son...
example.tran: 卡伦·史蒂文斯说在理想的生活中，她非常愿意呆在家里照料两岁半的儿子。

example.ex: In a perfect world, there would be the facilities and money to treat every sick person.
example.tran: 理想的状况是有足够的设备和财力治疗每一位病人。

entry.tran: 认为（自己）生来就该享福
entry.def: If you say that someone thinks that the world owes them a living, you are criticizing them because they think it is their right to have a comfortable life without having to make any effort at all.

example.ex: All young people must face up to reality and not kid themselves that the world owes them a living.
example.tran: 所有的年轻人都必须接受现实，不要自欺欺人，觉得生来就该享清福。

entry.tran: 阅历丰富的人;见过世面的人；老成稳重的人
entry.def: If you say that someone is a man of the world or a woman of the world, you mean that they are experienced and know about the practical or social aspects of life, and are not easily shocked by immoral or dishonest actions.

example.ex: Look, we are both men of the world, would anyone really mind?
example.tran: 听着，我们都是见过世面的人，真有人会介意吗？

example.ex: ...an elegant, clever and tough woman of the world.
example.tran: 优雅、聪明、顽强并且阅历丰富的女人

entry.tran: 极好的;一流的；非常棒的
entry.def: If you say that something is out of this world, you are emphasizing that it is extremely good or impressive.

example.ex: These new trains are out of this world.
example.tran: 这些新火车太棒了。

entry.def: You can use the outside world to refer to all the people who do not live in a particular place or who are not involved in a particular situation.

example.ex: For many, the post office is the only link with the outside world...
example.tran: 对很多人来说，这个邮局是与外界联系的唯一纽带。

example.ex: This, at least, was the situation as it appeared to the outside world.
example.tran: 至少在外界看来情况是这样的。

entry.def: If you say that something happens or exists the world over, you mean that it happens or exists in every part of the world.

example.ex: Some problems are the same the world over...
example.tran: 有些问题在全世界都一样。

example.ex: Governments the world over should do something about it.
example.tran: 世界各国政府应该对此采取行动。

entry.tran: 在自己的世界里;在自己的小天地里
entry.def: If you say that someone is in a world of their own, you mean that they seem not to notice other people or the things going on around them.

example.ex: When I'm swimming I'm in a world of my own...
example.tran: 游泳的时候，我沉浸在自己的世界里。

example.ex: Sarah was nine years old and until that moment she had been locked in a world of her own.
example.tran: 萨拉当时9岁，之前她一直封闭在自己的世界里。

entry.def: If you think the world of someone, you like them or care about them very much.

example.ex: I think the world of him, but something tells me it's not love...
example.tran: 我很在乎他，但是某种感觉告诉我这不是爱。

example.ex: We were really close. We thought the world of each other.
example.tran: 我们的确很亲近，非常在乎对方。

entry.tran: 发迹/落魄;飞黄腾达/潦倒
entry.def: If you say that someone has gone up in the world, you mean they have become richer or have a higher social status than before. If you say they have come down in the world, you mean they have become poorer or have a lower social status.

example.ex: When they started to go up in the world, they moved to a flat in London.
example.tran: 他们开始发家的时候，搬进了伦敦的一所公寓。

example.ex: ...young women of middle class families which had come down in the world.
example.tran: 出身于落魄的中产阶级家庭的年轻女子

means.word_mean: 1. all of the inhabitants of the earth;

sentences.sentence: "she always used `humankind' because `mankind' seemed to slight the women"
"they study the evolution of the universe"

means.word_mean: 3. all of your experiences that determine how things appear to you;

sentences.sentence: "for them demons were as much a part of reality as trees were"

means.word_mean: 4. people in general; especially a distinctive group of people with some shared interest;
5. the 3rd planet from the sun; the planet on which we live;
6. the concerns of the world as distinguished from heaven and the afterlife;

sentences.sentence: "they consider the church to be independent of the world"

means.word_mean: 7. a part of the earth that can be considered separately;
8. people in general considered as a whole;

sentences.sentence: "he is a hero in the eyes of the public"

means.word_mean: 1. involving the entire earth; not limited or provincial in scope;

list.explanation: 世界属于某人。 (意指某人可以控制一切。尤指某人日子过得不错、很兴旺、幸福。)

example.en: I feel like the world is my oyster today.
example.zh: 今天我觉得好像世界是属于我的。

example.en: The world is my oyster! I' m in tove!

auth_sentence.content: They want the world to hear Somalia's stories.
auth_sentence.res_content: They want the world to hear Somalia's stories.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They want the world to hear Somalia's stories.

auth_sentence.content: The World Bank and the IMF did not object.
auth_sentence.res_content: The World Bank and the IMF did not object.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The World Bank and the IMF did not object.

auth_sentence.content: BBC World News will soon be available in Burma.
auth_sentence.res_content: BBC World News will soon be available in Burma.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: BBC World News will soon be available in Burma.

means.word_mean: 世界, 地球, 天下

sentences.en: She has sailed round the world.
Our world is but small part of the universe.
sentences.cn: 我们的地球只不过是宇宙的一小部分。

means.word_mean: 众人; 世人; 人类

sentences.en: Keep quiet, we don't want the whole world to know about it.
sentences.cn: 安静些, 我们可不想让人人都知道这件事。

sentences.en: Human acts have repercussions far beyond the frontiers of the human world.
sentences.cn: 人类行为所产生的影响远远超出人类世界的范围。

sentences.en: He's very young and inexperienced, and doesn't know about the ways of the world.
sentences.cn: 他还很年轻, 又缺乏经验, 不懂得人情世故。

jushi.english: Is there life on other worlds?
You must see the world a lot.
They met a world of trouble.
